name: Fire Music
prerequisiteFormula: all(@skill:spellcraft>=5,max(@spells_per_day:bard#*)[Bard spells],"an arcane fire spell from some other spellcasting",!@feat:fire_music)

sections.Benefit: When you cast a bard spell that deals damage, you may replace the spell's normal damage with fire damage or split the spell's damage so that half of it is the normal damage type and half is fire damage.
